nodes.body: All the `bit0`, `bit1`, `vecAlt0` and `vecAlt1` lemmas / definitions that were originally written as part of my Lean 3 version of this `simp` support should also be removed (or at least deprecated), I don't think they have any likely use in Lean 4.

### Import summary

<details><summary>Dependency changes</summary>

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Data.Fin.VecNotation | 338 | 339 | +1 (+0.30%) |
</details>
Does this mean we can drop `Matrix.cons_val_one`, `Matrix.cons_val_two`, `Matrix.cons_val_three`, `Matrix.cons_val_four` etc below?

> All the `bit0`, `bit1`, `vecAlt0` and `vecAlt1` lemmas / definitions that were originally written as part of my Lean 3 version of this `simp` support should also be removed (or at least deprecated), I don't think they have any likely use in Lean 4.

I've deprecated the `bit0` and `bit1` lemmas, the rest still seem like there is a tiny chance someone might want them

> Does this mean we can drop `Matrix.cons_val_one`, `Matrix.cons_val_two`, `Matrix.cons_val_three`, `Matrix.cons_val_four` etc below?

From the simp set, yes; but I think they're harmless enough to keep around.

### PR summary

#### Import changes

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Data.Fin.VecNotation | 338 | 339 | +1 (+0.30%) |

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

pullRequest.title: feat: add a `dsimproc` for vector notation
